76 inline double ScanMatcher::icpStep(OrientedPoint & pret, const ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& p, const double* readings) const{
77  const double * angle=m_laserAngles+m_initialBeamsSkip;
78  OrientedPoint lp=p;
79  lp.x+=cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x-sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
80  lp.y+=sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x+cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
81  lp.theta+=m_laserPose.theta;
82  unsigned int skip=0;
83  double freeDelta=map.getDelta()*m_freeCellRatio;
84  std::list<PointPair> pairs;
85 
86  for (const double* r=readings+m_initialBeamsSkip; r<readings+m_laserBeams; r++, angle++){
87  skip++;
88  skip=skip>m_likelihoodSkip?0:skip;
89  if (*r>m_usableRange||*r==0.0) continue;
90  if (skip) continue;
91  Point phit=lp;
92  phit.x+=*r*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
93  phit.y+=*r*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
94  IntPoint iphit=map.world2map(phit);
95  Point pfree=lp;
96  pfree.x+=(*r-map.getDelta()*freeDelta)*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
97  pfree.y+=(*r-map.getDelta()*freeDelta)*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
98  pfree=pfree-phit;
99  IntPoint ipfree=map.world2map(pfree);
100  bool found=false;
101  Point bestMu(0.,0.);
102  Point bestCell(0.,0.);
103  for (int xx=-m_kernelSize; xx<=m_kernelSize; xx++)
104  for (int yy=-m_kernelSize; yy<=m_kernelSize; yy++){
105  IntPoint pr=iphit+IntPoint(xx,yy);
106  IntPoint pf=pr+ipfree;
107  //AccessibilityState s=map.storage().cellState(pr);
108  //if (s&Inside && s&Allocated){
109  const PointAccumulator& cell=map.cell(pr);
110  const PointAccumulator& fcell=map.cell(pf);
111  if (((double)cell )> m_fullnessThreshold && ((double)fcell )<m_fullnessThreshold){
112  Point mu=phit-cell.mean();
113  if (!found){
114  bestMu=mu;
115  bestCell=cell.mean();
116  found=true;
117  }else
118  if((mu*mu)<(bestMu*bestMu)){
119  bestMu=mu;
120  bestCell=cell.mean();
121  }
122 
123  }
124  //}
125  }
126  if (found){
127  pairs.push_back(std::make_pair(phit, bestCell));
128  //std::cerr << "(" << phit.x-bestCell.x << "," << phit.y-bestCell.y << ") ";
129  }
130  //std::cerr << std::endl;
131  }
132 
133  OrientedPoint result(0,0,0);
134  //double icpError=icpNonlinearStep(result,pairs);
135  std::cerr << "result(" << pairs.size() << ")=" << result.x << " " << result.y << " " << result.theta << std::endl;
136  pret.x=p.x+result.x;
137  pret.y=p.y+result.y;
138  pret.theta=p.theta+result.theta;
139  pret.theta=atan2(sin(pret.theta), cos(pret.theta));
140  return score(map, p, readings);
141 }
153 inline double ScanMatcher::score(const ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& p, const double* readings) const{
154  double s=0;
155  const double * angle=m_laserAngles+m_initialBeamsSkip;// m_initialBeamsSkip 2048
156  OrientedPoint lp=p;
157  lp.x+=cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x-sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;//lp laser pose 角度旋转 m_laserPose？？？
158  lp.y+=sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x+cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
159  lp.theta+=m_laserPose.theta;
160  unsigned int skip=0;
161  double freeDelta=map.getDelta()*m_freeCellRatio;
162  for (const double* r=readings+m_initialBeamsSkip; r<readings+m_laserBeams; r++, angle++){ //取激光束 m_likelihoodSkip*k + m_initialBeamsSkip
163  skip++;
164  skip=skip>m_likelihoodSkip?0:skip; //m_likelihoodSkip scan选择的密度
165  if (skip||*r>m_usableRange||*r==0.0) continue;
166  Point phit=lp;
167  phit.x+=*r*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
168  phit.y+=*r*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
169  IntPoint iphit=map.world2map(phit); //每束激光的位置 地图不变
170 
171  Point pfree=lp; //若占据，少一个栅格分度就不会占据
172  pfree.x+=(*r-map.getDelta()*freeDelta)*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
173  pfree.y+=(*r-map.getDelta()*freeDelta)*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
174  pfree=pfree-phit;//激光差量
175  IntPoint ipfree=map.world2map(pfree); //地图是否占据的差量
176 
177  bool found=false;
178  Point bestMu(0.,0.);
179  for (int xx=-m_kernelSize; xx<=m_kernelSize; xx++)
180  for (int yy=-m_kernelSize; yy<=m_kernelSize; yy++){
181  IntPoint pr=iphit+IntPoint(xx,yy);
182  IntPoint pf=pr+ipfree; // free的地图坐标
183  //AccessibilityState s=map.storage().cellState(pr);
184  //if (s&Inside && s&Allocated){
185  const PointAccumulator& cell=map.cell(pr);
186  const PointAccumulator& fcell=map.cell(pf);
187  if (((double)cell )> m_fullnessThreshold && ((double)fcell )<m_fullnessThreshold){
188  Point mu=phit-cell.mean();
189  if (!found){
190  bestMu=mu;
191  found=true;
192  }else
193  bestMu=(mu*mu)<(bestMu*bestMu)?mu:bestMu;
194  }
195  //}
196  }
197  if (found)
198  s+=exp(-1./m_gaussianSigma*bestMu*bestMu);
199  }
200  return s;
201 }
202 
212 inline unsigned int ScanMatcher::likelihoodAndScore(double& s, double& l, const ScanMatcherMap& map, const OrientedPoint& p, const double* readings) const{
213  using namespace std;
214  l=0;
215  s=0;
216  const double * angle=m_laserAngles+m_initialBeamsSkip;
217  OrientedPoint lp=p;
218  lp.x+=cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x-sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
219  lp.y+=sin(p.theta)*m_laserPose.x+cos(p.theta)*m_laserPose.y;
220  lp.theta+=m_laserPose.theta;
221  double noHit=nullLikelihood/(m_likelihoodSigma);//???
222  unsigned int skip=0;
223  unsigned int c=0;
224  double freeDelta=map.getDelta()*m_freeCellRatio;
225  for (const double* r=readings+m_initialBeamsSkip; r<readings+m_laserBeams; r++, angle++){
226  skip++;
227  skip=skip>m_likelihoodSkip?0:skip;
228  if (*r>m_usableRange) continue;
229  if (skip) continue;
230  Point phit=lp;
231  phit.x+=*r*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
232  phit.y+=*r*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
233  IntPoint iphit=map.world2map(phit);
234  Point pfree=lp;
235  pfree.x+=(*r-freeDelta)*cos(lp.theta+*angle);
236  pfree.y+=(*r-freeDelta)*sin(lp.theta+*angle);
237  pfree=pfree-phit;
238  IntPoint ipfree=map.world2map(pfree);
239  bool found=false;
240  Point bestMu(0.,0.);
241  for (int xx=-m_kernelSize; xx<=m_kernelSize; xx++)
242  for (int yy=-m_kernelSize; yy<=m_kernelSize; yy++){
243  IntPoint pr=iphit+IntPoint(xx,yy);
244  IntPoint pf=pr+ipfree;
245  //AccessibilityState s=map.storage().cellState(pr);
246  //if (s&Inside && s&Allocated){
247  const PointAccumulator& cell=map.cell(pr);
248  const PointAccumulator& fcell=map.cell(pf);
249  if (((double)cell )>m_fullnessThreshold && ((double)fcell )<m_fullnessThreshold){
250  Point mu=phit-cell.mean();
251  if (!found){
252  bestMu=mu;
253  found=true;
254  }else
255  bestMu=(mu*mu)<(bestMu*bestMu)?mu:bestMu;
256  }
257  //}
258  }
259  if (found){
260  s+=exp(-1./m_gaussianSigma*bestMu*bestMu);
261  c++;
262  }
263  if (!skip){
264  double f=(-1./m_likelihoodSigma)*(bestMu*bestMu);
265  l+=(found)?f:noHit;
266  }
267  }
268  return c;
269 }
